column4: Anyone here able to help me figure out what's wrong with esound?
dont you get sound from esound? I dont either. Im using Hoary. Dont know why realy. :(
it seems some update messed up my mixer settings. apps like xine listen to the mixer now, but rythmbox et all don't

I dont know what causes my problem. I can listen to music if i set gstreamer-properties to use alsa. But if i set it to esd, and try to play the audio-test, I cant hear something. It seems esd wont play sound :(
